DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label crossover study . The primary objective study compare relative bioavailability eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) , docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) , docosapentaenoic acid ( DPA ) , ethyl ester EPA DHA plasma single 2 g 4 g dose Epanova® 4 g Lovaza® .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Crossover Study Compare Relative Bioavailability , Efficacy Safety Epanova® Lovaza® Men Women With History Pancreatitis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female , ≥18 year age ; 2 . History serum TG concentration ≥500 mg/dL within past 5 year ; 3 . Have least one episode document hospitalization pancreatitis due hypertriglyceridemia his/her lifetime ; 4 . Have health condition would prevent him/her fulfil study requirement judge Investigator basis physical examination , ECG , medical history , routine laboratory test result ; 5 . Willing maintain his/her current activity level follow either NCEP TLC diet caloric target weight maintenance prescribe lowfat diet screening , treatment , washout period ( Visits 1 6b ; Weeks 4 12 ) ; 6 . Willing eat standardize breakfast , lunch , dinner meal snack Visits 4b 6b ( Weeks 4 12 ) ; 7 . Willing abstain alcohol consumption avoid vigorous physical activity 48 hour prior Visits 3 6b ( Weeks 0 12 ) ; 8 . Subject understands study procedure willing able sign inform consent form participate study Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act authorization release relevant protect health information Investigators study personnel . 1 . An allergy intolerance omega3 fatty acid , omega3acid ethyl ester , fish , component standardize breakfast , lunch , dinner meal snack ( describe study staff ) 2 . Poorly control hypertension ( rest blood pressure ≥160 mmHg systolic and/or ≥100 mmHg diastolic ) prior randomization ( Visit 3 [ Week 0 ] ) 3 . A history cancer ( basal cell carcinoma ) last 2 year 4 . A recent cardiovascular event ( i.e. , myocardial infarction , acute coronary syndrome , new onset angina , stroke , transient ischemic attack , unstable congestive heart failure require change treatment ) , aortic aneurysm resection , carotid endarterectomy , revascularization procedure within 6 month prior Visit 1
